data.actual_result: Color picker doesn't detect the custom colour and displays #000000 until you click another role first
data.expected_result: Color picker displays the custom colour correctly
data.short_description: Viewing a role with a custom colour doesn't display the correct color in the picker until you click another role
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a role with a custom colour - Exit out of server settings - Re-open server settings - Go to Roles and click on the role with custom colour - Click on the option to choose a custom color (square should be grey)
